segments.text: I can’t believe how focused the woman is on her dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn’t she hear the water running everywhere?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost like a scene from a play where she’s the only one who doesn’t know she’s in danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy is acting like a little thief, sneaking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I shake my head, thinking about how careless this all is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems so hopeful, her open palm almost pitiful as she waits.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but wonder how this will turn out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Is it wrong that I feel a bit of glee in their mischievous act?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water pooling on the floor feels like a metaphor for something deeper.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to step in and save them all from themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR
